resources.string: Your spells will be displayed here, \nadd some using \"Add spell\" section
How to add spells to spellbook:
Go to the \"Add spell\" tab and choose a spell available for your current character\'s class or go to the \"Add non-class spell\" tab to add any spell available in the app.
How to delete spells from spellbook:
Go to \"Browse prepared spells\" and long press on a spell you want to delete.

Click on a search button at the bottom right corner of any browsing tab, then type in the search bar at the top what spell are you looking for.\nFor advanced filtering click the second button that appears above the previous search button, then choose your preferences and click apply.
How to create a new character:
Go to the \"Create new character\" tab, then enter your desired name and choose their class from the list, then press \"Save\" to accept.
To change active character go to the \"Switch character\" tab, then choose the desired character from the list.
To delete a character just long press a character you\'d like to delete in the \"Switch character\" tab.
How to preview a spell before adding:
To preview a spell during adding just long press on a spell you\'d like to see all the details of.
